description:
Unable to practice at their usual spot, Haneru and Kanon get dragged off by Mizuki to Tribal Soul`s hangout. But there, Kumo tells them not to make light of dancing. Haneru shows off his newly-acquired isolation skills and his special jumps, but he can`t get Kumo to bat an eyelid. Things get gloomy as Haneru and Kanon are at a loss as to how to improve before the tournament.
Source: crunchyroll
